title: History of The Rt Hon Lord Cameron - GOV.UK

quotes: In 2011, the UK also took a lead in the international intervention in Libya.
Following the UK hosting the successful London 2012 Olympic and Paralympic Games, he chaired the 2013 G8 Summit in Northern Ireland
The first in 2011, known as the alternative vote referendum, asked whether the current existing method of electing MPs should remain for future general elections.
The second referendum held in 2014 asked whether Scotland should be an independent country.
In June 2016, the British people voted to leave the EU and following this result, he resigned as Prime Minister and leader of the Conservative Party
leaving 10 Downing Street on 13
